colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

containerRef.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | ((instance: HTMLDivElement | null) => void)
  | MutableRefObject<HTMLDivElement | null>

controlRef.description: Ref of the resizable item callback.

disabled.description: If `true`, the resizable trigger will be disabled.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the resizable trigger will be disabled.

keyboardStep.description: Unit to resize by keyboard operation.

onLayout.description: The callback invoked when resizable items are resized.

storage.description: A callback that gets and sets a value in custom storage.

storageKey.description:
Key of value saved in storage.
By default, it is saved to `local storage`.

collapsedSize.description: The collapsed size of the resizable item.

collapsible.description: If `true`, the resizable item can be collapsed.

containerProps.description: Props for resizable item container element.

controlRef.description: Ref of the resizable item callback.

defaultSize.description: The initial size of the resizable item.

id.description: id assigned to resizable item element.

innerRef.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | ((instance: HTMLDivElement | null) => void)
  | MutableRefObject<HTMLDivElement | null>
innerRef.description: Ref for resizable item inner element.

maxSize.description: The maximum allowed value of the resizable item.

minSize.description: The minimum allowed value of the resizable item.

onCollapse.description: The callback invoked when resizable item are collapsed.

onExpand.description: The callback invoked when resizable item are expanded.

onResize.description: The callback invoked when resizable item are resized.

icon.description: The resizable trigger icon to use.

iconProps.description: Props for resizable trigger icon component.

id.description: id assigned to resizable trigger element.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the resizable trigger will be disabled.
